title: Bourdaloue, 18th or early 19th century
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Maxime Hermanos
description: Deep oval vessel of blue-tinged faience with rounded sides, loop handle, low foot. Around body between narrow blue bands and scalloped dark red bands are dark blue underglaze leaves outlined in black on black vines with berries cross-hatched in overglaze dark red. Underglaze blue decoration on handle. Undulating reserve line through blue band around foot with spun-like marks exposing body.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bourdaloue, 18th or early 19th century.
18th or early 19th century. Porcelain; faience. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Maxime Hermanos. 1967-84-2.
